lines.text: Perfection is approachable, Sean, as I have often told you.

[Sean Kane is leaving a house, finds that his car is being towed, moves past the tow truck driver and unhooks the hook]
Hey, pal, that car is gone!

[meekly]
Ok, have it your own way.

[knocking a bad guy out with a handy desk telephone]
The warrior uses whatever is closest to hand.
